CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions (U.S. government clouds)
OldVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
CurrentVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
OldVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Management of BYOD (Bring your own device) meeting spaces with Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description: The BYOD (bring your own device) rooms in the Pro Management Portal provides IT admins with a comprehensive overview of their BYOD rooms' utilization and activities. With this new addition, IT admins will gain valuable insights into how these spaces are being utilized, enabling them to make data driven decisions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Management of BYOD (Bring your own device) meeting spaces with Teams Rooms Pro Management
OldVersion.description: The BYOD (bring your own device) rooms in the Pro Management Portal provides IT admins with a comprehensive overview of their BYOD rooms' utilization and activities. With this new addition, IT admins will gain valuable insights into how these spaces are being utilized, enabling them to make data driven decisions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Conversation Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: ,Updates to conversation analytics will allow users to better understand engagement trends that occur on their posts including employee sentiment on popular conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Conversation Analytics
OldVersion.description: ,Updates to conversation analytics will allow users to better understand engagement trends that occur on their posts including employee sentiment on popular conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Expanded reactions in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: We're expanding the set of reactions available in all instances of Viva Engage. Users will see an additional 24 icons on top of the 6 we already offer. These new icons cover a wide range of emotions and sentiments, helping users express themselves and improve engagement in your network.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Expanded reactions in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description:
We're expanding the
set of reactions available in all instances of Viva Engage. Users will see
an additional 24 icons on top of the 6 we already offer. These new icons cover
a wide range of emotions and sentiments, helping users express themselves and
improve engagement in your network.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Domain/URL Update
CurrentVersion.description: To align the URL with the new Viva Engage branding and as part of the unified domain for Microsoft 365 initiative, Viva Engage’s URL schema is being updated. This change includes domains only. A separate roadmap will be created for email sender changes. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Domain/URL Update
OldVersion.description: To align the URL with the new Viva Engage branding and as part of the unified domain for Microsoft 365 initiative, Viva Engage’s URL schema is being updated. This change includes domains only. A separate roadmap will be created for email sender changes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
OldVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
OldVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Additional capabilities for Microsoft 365 users in Microsoft Project for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, users with Microsoft 365 licenses can view projects shared with them by users of Microsoft Project for the web. This update will enable Microsoft 365 users to collaborate more seamlessly with Project users by editing shared projects. The added capabilities enable Microsoft 365 users to access any functionality where Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Project for the web overlap. Note: This feature is specific to projects that are created within the default environment, such as by using project.microsoft.com.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Additional capabilities for Microsoft 365 users in Microsoft Project for the web
OldVersion.description: Currently, users with Microsoft 365 licenses can view projects shared with them by users of Microsoft Project for the web. This update will enable Microsoft 365 users to collaborate more seamlessly with Project users by editing shared projects. The added capabilities enable Microsoft 365 users to access any functionality where Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Project for the web overlap. Note: This feature is specific to projects that are created within the default environment, such as by using project.microsoft.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: In-Person Event
CurrentVersion.description: New option during event creation in Outlook will allow organizer to request invitees to attend the event in person. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View, download and delete OneDrive transcript files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: We are simplifying the storage and management of meeting transcript files by focusing transcript actions such as view, download, and delete to source from one place (OneDrive for Business) instead of two places (OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View, download and delete OneDrive transcript files in Teams
OldVersion.description: We are simplifying the storage and management of meeting transcript files by focusing transcript actions such as view, download, and delete to source from one place (OneDrive for Business) instead of two places (OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online).

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Preview of New Sticky Notes app on Windows available from OneNote app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is expanding its notetaking solution, OneNote, to include users who need a simple and quick way to jot down ideas and remember important information while staying focused on the task at hand. New Sticky Notes is a new experience built on the foundation of OneNote that offers the same experience as existing Sticky Notes, while making it easier to capture screenshots, automatically add the source information to the notes, and more. Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality with supported platforms including Teams, Email, Slack along with Copy link options. They can share specific goals, initiatives, dashboards, explorer views, check-ins as well as entire goals or initiative lists.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
OldVersion.description: Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality with supported platforms including Teams, Email, Slack along with Copy link options. They can share specific goals, initiatives, dashboards, explorer views, check-ins as well as entire goals or initiative lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin setting for uploading files using drag-drop
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to control the default content app for local files uploaded using drag-drop in chat and channels. OneDrive / SharePoint are the existing default locations for uploads using drag-drop.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin setting for uploading files using drag-drop
OldVersion.description: Admin will be able to control the default content app for local files uploaded using drag-drop in chat and channels. OneDrive / SharePoint are the existing default locations for uploads using drag-drop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
OldVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

OldVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
OldVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: screen recorder on mobile device
CurrentVersion.description: We are not releasing this feature at this time and apologize for any inconvenience. You can use Teams on your Android device to record your screen and share it with others in any channel or chat. Just press and hold the camera icon next to the compose box and then tap the screen recorder icon to begin the recording.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: screen recorder on mobile device
OldVersion.description: You can use Teams on your Android device to record your screen and share it with others in any channel or chat. Just press and hold the camera icon next to the compose box and then tap the screen recorder icon to begin the recording.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quicker sign in without entering the domain name
CurrentVersion.description: Users can skip typing the full user principal name (UPN) and sign in faster on shared and managed devices, by using app configuration policies to autofill the domain name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Question level permissions
CurrentVersion.description: Enable question level permissions for survey takers

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access through M365 header
CurrentVersion.description: Solution available on M365 header for improved discoverability

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Via Glint - Access through Viva App Bar
CurrentVersion.description: Solution available on Viva App Bar and Viva Home for improved discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Upload custom PowerPoint templates
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to upload custom PowerPoint templates for exports

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New landing experience for Viva Connections desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Help people in your organization manage their daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps and acts as the home base for Viva experiences in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Regional announcements for FLW users in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Create and share time sensitive messages in Viva Connections and target your FLW users based on attributes including job, description and title. You can view these announcements on Viva Connections desktop, mobile and tablet.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on desktop in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing or reordering the dashboard cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search-UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Remove export limit in Device Onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to export all from the device onboarding page without page limits.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced privacy control: Limiting PII data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: ,There will be an improvement in privacy measures. Access to PII data will be restricted. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Analytics and Recommendations to understand risks, improve existing policies and improve posture
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards:  for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

CurrentVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.
